name: Mobster Lobster
description:
Mobster Lobster is a 4 player local action party game.

1 player is the Mob Boss, spawning and playing as evil fish minions.

3 players are Otters, beating up the evil minions.

Gamepad support up to 4 players.

Keyboard support up to 2 players:

WASD, left shift, space.

Arrow keys, numpad/keypad 1 and 2.
